channel.title: ::train command <> [317] [PI]
channel.description:
Hi Im currently working on a 317 Pi source+client I fixed Sled Stance But then i realised there was no ::train Ive tryed several tutorials and there just BS
My Train Location is obviously Rock crabs-The usual One
Coords- 2677,3716
Please help :)

item.title: ::train command <> [317] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RsMakerWoad RsMakerWoad
item.description:
@RsMakerWoad wrote:

[quote=“sop-scape, post:2, topic:455498”] } if (playerCommand.startsWith("train")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2677, 3716, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to training!"); }

that should help you! goodluck with your server[/quote]
It didnt work at the start but thanks to my bestfriend it works now,thanks anyway

Read full topic

item.title: ::train command <> [317] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

if (player.Commands.startsWith("train")) { String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(2677, 3716, 0, type); }

Or even better just add a teleport on the magic book to get there lol.

Read full topic

that should help you! goodluck with your server
[/quote]
What if he’s not using a PI based source?[/quote]
Why ask that if he said he is…
